title: The End of the Prince Who Broke His Engagement With Me and Tried To Take My Lovely Sister as His Wife - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Broken Engagement   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Marriage of Convenience   Nobles   Royalty   Short Story   Sister Complex
author: Aira Yao   八緒あいら (nns)
description:
The Duke's daughter, Leila, has been destined to marry the fifth prince, Oswald, ever since she was a child.
The only person who can truly support him is herself, his fiancé.

That's why Leila didn't indulge Oswald any more than necessary, and sometimes gave him a hard time.
Because that was her way of loving him.

―However, Leila's thoughts did not reach Oswald.

'I'm breaking off my engagement with you, you nagging little b!tch! Instead, I'm taking your sister as my wife!'
'Eh...'
>
